snippet.title: Core Defense Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A roguelike tower defense game with a dash of deckbuilding. Choose a reward, improve your build, survive the next wave, repeat. Highly replayable, difficult, and addictive. You'll want just one more wave, just one more run!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1203360/Core_Defense/
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/URcmzXm
Play the free demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1259230/Core_Defense_Prelude/
Buy on Itch.io: https://ehmprah.itch.io/core-defense
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ehmprah
